title: Switching Server and Name
body: So, i am thinking of moving over to the Japan server from the NA server.  If i change servers, do i have to change my name?  This is while assuming that my name is not taken on the Japan server already.  I would also like to ask if i have to change my name if i switch from Japan server to NA (assuming name not taken).  I heard that if i switch over to Japan server, use japanese characters in my name, then switch back to NA, i can keep the japanese characters in my name.  I want to see if this is true or not.

replies.body:
You only need to change your summoner name if your current summoner name is already in use on the new region. If you transferred back to NA, you would not be able to keep your summoner name, as Japanese characters are **not supported** on NA.

Check out our [**Account Transfer FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ/) for more info on how this system works. Let me know if you have any other questions.
